name: AIM cForm
description: Application to upload cForm  Please fill all requested fields in registration mail before sending mail,else your device registration will not be completed.  * Please send registration mail to your zone RW **Mails sent to software committee email id will not be entertained.  Version 1.3.1.12 - Replaced IMEI with UUID due to Android 10 restrictions.   v1.3.1.10 - Fixed notification issue in Oreo and Pie devices.  v1.3.1.8 - Fixed report display issue. - Fixed issues of previous version release.  v1.3.1.6 - IKP Section added.  v1.3.1.4 - Fixed critical performance issue. - Improved cForm layout.  v1.3.1.3 - Cosmetic issues fixed.  v1.3.1.2 - Change IMEI from device. - Added settings screen to disable controls for students marked as absent.  v1.3.0.7 - Added label to put YM for Yaade Mahdi in Akhlaaq. - Server side validations added.  v1.3.0.6 - Fixed issue of dialog cancel in class speed data upload.  v1.3.0.5 - Push notifications added. - Save your class position (Tap and hold on class and select Class Speed from reports dropdown). - Optimized for android 6.0+ for system access permission.  v1.1.0.2 -Delete cForm option added (Only editable cForm can be deleted) -Cross db classes can be mapped.  v1.0.5.1 - Profile (change password) added. - Now edit cForm from app (Only one week old cForm can be edited) - View cForm details - Double tap to go back from cForm details (Avoid accidental back press causes filled cForm data loss) - Save credentials - Forgot password added  v1.0.4.5 - Performance improvement  v1.0.4.4 - Critical bug fix in fetching class details.  v1.0.4.3 - Optimized for android 5.0+ - Placeholder text color changed.  v1.0.4.2 - Minor bug fixed of database upgrade.  v1.0.4.1 - Last conducted subject details in placeholder. - Now committee request can be sent from app. - Profile (change password) coming soon. - Minor bug in login fixed.  v1.0.4 - Minor bug of keyboard popup fixed.  v1.0.3 - Post dated cForm upload is blocked. - Class Report,Class Report II and Students Reports added. Long press on class to select report and period. - Stability improvement.  v1.0.2 - Fixed back press crash issue on android 4.0 device. - Class no is added in registration mail.  v1.0.1 - Some minor bug fix.
